name: Fever Dream (astrangefool)
description:
"Can you defeat the implacable forces of orthogonality? Are you the dreamer or the dream?"

- Created in 6 hours for the 2020 LOWREZJAM.

My first PICO-8 game, completed just in time to miss the deadline for LOWREZJAM 2020, which left me a little bitter. Let this be a lesson to read how to export a game more than 5 minutes before a deadline.
